HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Opportunistic hauls Vanilla has support for opportunities, but with limitations: haulable near your start position, and storage near your job. We prefer these, but drop them as requirements to include hauls along the path. • Triggers Mehni's Pick Up And Haul. Haul extra construction supplies closer If hauling supplies to storage would bring them closer to their blueprint, do that first (grabbing extra).

We skip opportunities when bleeding or forming a caravan. • Updated Haul extra resources Now works as expected: instead of denying the inefficient supply job so some hauler eventually hauls, the builder themselves will.

• Hauls are substantially improved on the default "recommended" setting. No longer should distant wood cut or metal mined be neglected. (I've integrated the very last vanilla pathing check into this mod's magic.)
• Setting tooltips updated with detailed descriptions.
Pick Up And Haul+: Opportunities Modified to grab only surrounding things whose unload path is also opportunistic.
• New job descriptions. • Added Enabled setting for troubleshooting without restarts. • Improved settings and descriptions.
• Compatibility with KV's Infinite Storage: Haul extra resources should now work instead of looping on storage and retrieval.
Haul extra bill ingredients closer If hauling ingredients to storage would bring them closer to their workbench, do that first (grabbing extra).
• Fixed Haul extra ingredients to no longer cause "Standing" loop when incapable. (Missed a basic check vanilla already did in the Haul extra supplies scenario.)
• Fixed Haul extra resources to no longer cause "Standing" loop when ingredient is in a pawn inventory. Fixes surgery with Smart Medicine, compatibility with Build From Inventory, and others.

Pick Up And Haul+: Better unloading We enhance all inventory hauling by unloading only once at each storage destination, in closest order. • Haul extra resources will trigger more often: - Fixed hauling from existing storage, not just un-stored. - New from same-priority storage setting. - Checks closest storage (to destination, not thing) for closeness to destination. • Added job reports for Haul extra resources and efficient unloading. • Updated Draw special hauls to include resource hauls (magenta & cyan). • Updated for RimWorld 1.3.

• Improving storage mod compatibility: - A̶d̶d̶e̶d̶ ̶"̶S̶t̶o̶c̶k̶p̶i̶l̶e̶s̶ ̶o̶n̶l̶y̶"̶ ̶s̶e̶t̶t̶i̶n̶g̶ ̶(̶o̶n̶ ̶b̶y̶ ̶d̶e̶f̶a̶u̶l̶t̶)̶.̶ - Switched to vanilla-style settings window (future room for a storage building allow-list). • Setting for Draw special hauls is now saved. Try it out, it's fun! See tooltip for description.
• Fixed hauling loop issue with PUAH, chunks, and multiple dumping stockpiles.
• Fixed inventory hauling check to work with non-Pawns (e.g. Misc. Robots mod).
• Fixed Extra resource hauls occasionally being recalculated many times in 1 tick.
• Fixed recent "̶S̶t̶o̶c̶k̶p̶i̶l̶e̶s̶ ̶o̶n̶l̶y̶"̶ ̶s̶e̶t̶t̶i̶n̶g̶ accidentally applying to all inventory hauling (PUAH). • Clarity improvements to mod settings dialog.

<color=teal>Storage building filters for mod compatibility</color> Permit or deny for any storage building through settings, or leave automatically managed with mod updates.
Skip opportunities when forming a caravan

BUG FIXES & UI UPDATE
• Opportunities - Now prefer highest storage closest to job, not to thing. - Added stockpile checkbox and building filters. - New job report: "on the way to [TARGET]"
• Supplies & Ingredients - Added stockpile checkbox. - New job report: "closer to [TARGET]" - Pick Up And Haul+: - Modified to grab extra things headed to the same storage (when higher priority). - Grab extra supplies & ingredients headed to the same storage (when equal priority).
• Pick Up And Haul+: - Fixed unloading storage choice to match calculation for haul. - After closest storage, will unload by thing category like original PUAH. - Improved performance by caching haulable destinations.
• Redesigned settings dialog. • Put job strings in XML for easier translation. • Many code quality improvements that made all of this much easier.
• Renamed mod to ^ from: Jobs of Opportunity (While You're Up)
• Fixed a v3.0 crash related to storage capacity with PUAH. (I was making PUAH cache haul destinations where it shouldn't: in a loop!)

• Improvements for non-Pick Up And Haul users (PUAH is too complex for these) - Only haul an ingredient to storage if there are extras - Only haul a construction supply to storage if there are extras - Haul largest nearby supply stack instead of absolute closest
• Fixed Haul extra supplies accidentally disabled since v2.1.3.
• PUAH unloading - Fix potential IndexOutOfRange error; performance improvement.
• A simpler, more complete fix than v3.0.2 for a PUAH-performance-boost related crash.
• Fixed Haul extra supplies to check incapable of dumb labor etc. (Like opportunities and ingredients.)

If willing, please report issues immediately via Discord link here ↗ or in Mods menu. Features • Pathfinding option added to settings (off by default). Fixes • Performance improvements to Opportunities. • Skip opportunities when gathering animals (not just items) for a caravan. • Mods which patch ThingFilter at startup will no longer break WYU settings window.
